sentences.en: Does he feel bloated after a heavy fatty, or greasy meal?
sentences.cn: 他吃了大量的脂肪性或油腻的食物后感到饱胀 吗 ?

sentences.en: He held out his greasy hand.
sentences.cn: 一只大手,满是油污,伸到陈静面前.

sentences.en: He propped his elbows upon a greasy counter.
sentences.cn: 他的双肘撑在满是油污的柜台上。

sentences.en: I usually have to wash the greasy pots and pans.
sentences.cn: 我得常常洗沾满油污的锅子.

sentences.en: Mr. Slope's civility had been more than ordinarily greasy.
sentences.cn: 斯洛普先生的礼仪比平日更为谄媚.

sentences.en: People suffering from dysentery must avoid raw , cold or greasy food.
sentences.cn: 得了痢疾忌讳吃生冷油腻食物.

sentences.en: The food was heavy and greasy.
The meat was burned, lumpy, cold, greasy , altogether odious.
sentences.cn: 肉是烧焦的, 又硬, 又冷, 又油腻, 简直叫人恶心.

sentences.en: The sight of the greasy stew made his stomach turn / turned his stomach.
sentences.cn: 他一看见油腻的炖肉就恶心.

sentences.en: They ate heavily of coarse, greasy food.
sentences.cn: 他们狼吞虎咽地吃粗粝油腻的食物.

sentences.en: This consists of conversion of greasy wool into clean wool.
sentences.cn: 这是把含脂的羊毛变成干净的羊毛.

sentences.en: This stew is a bit greasy.
Too much greasy food isn't good for you.
sentences.cn: 太油腻的食物对你不利.

sentences.en: You loathe the smell of greasy food when you are seasick.
sentences.cn: 当你晕船时,你会厌恶油腻的气味.
